title: Indians who prepaid $1,000 to order Tesla EVs ask for their money back as cars fail to arrive
description: In 2016, Tesla invited preorders for the Model 3 in India, but the cars never arrived, mainly due to tax concerns and factory issues. Other automakers have since launched EVs in India, and the market has evolved. Despite reduced import duties, Tesla's plans for an Indian factory and affordable EVs remain unclear.
